ygData.subject: fear kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: (I ask this question inspite of the nerf yesterday) I ve only had screech for a little while but have found that two or three resists and I take huge amounts
ygData.messageBody:
(I ask this question inspite of the nerf yesterday)

I've only had screech for a little while but have
found that two or three resists and I take huge
amounts of damage from a very angry mob when fear
kiting.

This is what I've been doing:

Fear-kite bank

1. Chains
2. Screech
3. DDD
4. Selo's
5. Sense heading
6. empty

So I chain - fear - DDD rinse and repeat.
Weapons are a thulian claw and silvery axe.

I've actually found it easier to soften mobs up using
chains and a few bellows, then wade in with the
all-instrument attack.

Do these songs get better over time or am I doomed to
resist hell? I know I must be missing something
because others have been successful at kiting...what
am I doing wrong?

Thanks

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
hitting 28th lvl again for the 4th time
